thoughts: Is angry that {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} never got to become leader
Is ordering around the other cats in the Dark Forest
Sulks about how little power {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/have/has} now

Knows that {PRONOUN/m_c/subject}'d be a better leader of c_n than the current one is

Wishes {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} knew how to control the shadows

Is deeply offended when another Dark Forest cat doesn't recognize {PRONOUN/m_c/object}
